jisa.devices

Interface ISource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Instrument
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DCPower, IVSource, MCSMU, SMU
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyMCSMU, K1234, K2200, K236, K2400, K2450, K2600B, K6430, KeithleySCPI, MCSMU.VirtualSMU, SMUCluster, TestFET, TSX3510P

    public interface ISource
extends Instrument
    Interface to define the standard functionality of an instrument that can source current.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getCurrent()
      Returns the current being output.
      boolean isOn()
      Returns whether the current-source is on or off.
      void setCurrent(double current)
      Sets the current to output.
      void turnOff()
      Turns the current-source off.
      void turnOn()
      Turns the current-source on.

      • Methods inherited from interface jisa.devices.Instrument

        close, getAddress, getIDN, setTimeout
